title: Overcoming Adversity and Winning With Money (Hour 2)
description:
Dr. John Delony & George Kamel discuss:

What to do with an inherited IRA,

Being independent with high-functioning autism,

Not being on the same page with a spouse,

Negotiating with debt-collectors,

Helping a child struggling with suicidal threats.


Support Our Sponsor:

DreamCloud

Splash Financial


Have a question for the show? Call 888-825-5225 Weekdays from 2-5pm ET

Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
